nl.fw.yapool.sql.hibernate

Class HibernatePools

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.fw.yapool.sql.hibernate.HibernatePools
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IHibernatePools

    public class HibernatePools
extends Object
implements IHibernatePools
    Default registry for SqlPools used by Hibernate. See also HibernateConnectionProvider.

    FWiers
